DOC.brief_summary: To increase diagnostic accuracy subepithelial tumor , large tissue sample require . It difficult obtain adequate tissue sample . There several biopsy method obtain tissue sample . Pathological examination would include mitosis count , particularly hypoechoic subepithelial tumor locate 4th layer gastric wall , differentiation leiomyoma benign nature gastrointestinal stromal tumor ( GIST ) malignant potential essential . So We hypothesize unroofing biopsy appropriate method EUS-FNB ( endoscopic ultrasonography guide fine needle biopsy ) . We compare diagnostic accuracy complication EUS-FNB & unroofing biopsy .
DOC.brief_title: Biopsy Protocol Upper Gastrointestinal Subepithelial Tumors : Diagnostic Accuracy EUS-FNB Versus Unroofing Biopsy
DOC.criteria: Older 19 year old young 80 year old Suspected upper gastrointestinal subepithelial tumor ( ≥15mm , ≤35mm ) originate muscularis propria layer endoscopic ultrasonography ( EUS ) Patient bleed tendency Any previous surgery esophagus , stomach duodenum Patients underwent sedate endoscopy Gastrointestinal subepithelial tumor origianted muscularis propria layer EUS Constrast related allergic disease
